text: Van (Armenian ) is a city in eastern Turkey and the seat of Van Province. It is on the eastern shore of Lake Van. The city's population in 2005 was 284,464. According to the Encyclopedia of the Orient, Kurds form the majority though no census based on ethnicity was ever held in Turkey. == Other websites == *Plan of Van city as it was before 1915 Category:Cities in Turkey
title: Van, Turkey
